Package com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment.engine

Interface MasterCardTransactionContext

All Superinterfaces:
TransactionContext
public interface MasterCardTransactionContext extends TransactionContext
This interface contains the value of Transaction Context Specifically for MasterCard.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method

    TransactionType
    getRichTrxType()
    Retrieve the Rich transactionType defined by MCBP 2.1.

    Retrieve the Terminal Info (TerminalType, TerminalTechnology, 2 tap support, cdcvm support, pdol, cdol) For master Card.

    since 6.10.0 : Use TransactionContext.getTrxId()

    • getRichTrxType

      TransactionType getRichTrxType()
